cultural context of the mass media in the last two and a half-centuries is
the development of technique for using non«human resources to serve human
needs for goods and serviceso In the early part of this period the changes
involved mostly the production of tangible goods and services and proceeded
through the development of new power sources (steam and water power) and tech¬
niques for mechanically using this power commonly called the Industrial
